institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 4 (Work performed by the Corporation)
contents: Article 4 (Works performed by the Corporation) ① The Corporation performs the following tasks necessary for industry-led training projects: 1. Operation of the human resource development deliberation committee for each industry, 2. Review, evaluation, and selection of the business plan of the business group. Support, 3. Monitoring of the business group's management and use of support funds, 4. Recognition of industry-led training project training courses and payment of training costs, 5. Approval of the business group's request for change in support funds, 6. Selection of the business group's accounting settlement performer and Designation, 7. Matters related to performance evaluation of industry-led training projects, 8. Recovery or recovery of support funds due to cancellation of selection of business group, etc., 9. Other tasks related to industry-led training projects, ② Pursuant to Article 6 of the Operation Regulations, the Chairman of the Board shall: An annual business plan must be established and approved by the Minister of Employment and Labor by the end of the relevant year. ③ The Chairman may delegate some of the duties under paragraph (1) to the Corporation branches or branches.
